name: Dave Richardson
text: I've partnered with bloom twice, at Deliveroo and Monzo, & both times they have been really successful Partnering with bloom is effortless seamless and most importantly fun, they just get it !

name: James Smith
description: Scotsman living in England via California and DJ, F1 & football fanatic.
text: Sam is the first external PM recruiter I've spoken to who gets it. His understanding of the PM space, his friendliness and caring nature, and his network of connections are second to none in the industry. Sam was generous with his time and opened doors. A+ would work with him again.
